In most of the cities, #wastewater is let out partially treated or untreated and it either percolates into the ground and in turn contaminates the ground water or it is discharged into the natural #drainage system causing #pollution in downstream water bodies.

In urban areas for #domestic and #industrial uses the source of #water is generally #reservoir, #river, #lake, and wells. Out of this total water supplied, generally 60 to 80% contributes as a #wastewater.

#Urbanization has encouraged the migration of #people from #villages to the #urban areas. This
has given rise to a number of #environmental problems such as, water supply with desirable
quality and quantity, #wastewater generation and its collection, treatment and disposal.
